thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com | 3 of 221
thread.title: Kevin Handy
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Kevin Handy

author: Kevin Handy
title: Kevin Handy
text:
Prices were better than others with the exception of the "off site" or "not at the airport" rental places. They can be a nightmare...I have had to walk more than a mile with my luggage because one of these rental companies stated that they were a short walk from the airport. Not a bad walk...UNLESS YOU ARE CARRYING LUGGAGE!!!
I like that this site offers the rate with and without insurance and taxes are INCLUDED!!! I know what I am spending and what I am receiving for my money!!!
